name: Robot Poncots: Moon Version
overview: Within Robopon Sun, Star, and Moon versions, the player assumes the role of a child named Cody, whose grandpa is retiring and gives him the family business, a Robopon Dispatching Company.[2] Cody travels around Porombo Island collecting Robopon and battling against the "Legend 7", the top-ranked Robopon collectors on the island.[3] Each time Cody successfully beats one of the Legend 7, he takes his or her place in the ranking system. "Robopon Sun Version" and "Robopon Star Version" have been upgraded! Of course, the device using the TV and video remote control is still alive! Depending on the type of remote control, there are 6 types of events to be held this time. A variety of attractions such as "fighting ground" and "playground" are also available.
